mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM permission p INNER JOIN role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE rp.role_id = #{roleId} ORDER BY p.sort ASC
SELECT DISTINCT p.* FROM permission p INNER JOIN role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id INNER JOIN user_role ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY p.sort ASC
SELECT * FROM permission WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY sort ASC
